item.title: Using Git: A Dialogue Between a Language Teacher and a Linux Sysadmin
item.description: ‘What is Git?’, Yuni asks. Yuni is an online teacher of Indonesian and an aspiring Linux user. ‘Well, it’s sort of a cross between a time machine and a kitchen blender, the one you make your smoothies with from all these exotic fruits that grow in your backyard’, Toomas responds. Toomas is a programmer and a Linux sysadmin. ‘I know my kitchen blender A to Z’, says Yuni proudly. ‘Why don’t you tell me about time machine part first?
